remarks: A direct product in a subgroup.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2016.)
statement:
subgdprd.1 $e |- H = ( G |`s A ) $.
subgdprd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
subgdprd.3 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
subgdprd.4 $e |- ( ph -> ran S C_ ~P A ) $.
subgdprd $p |- ( ph -> ( H DProd S ) = ( G DProd S ) ) $.
